definition: secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: Plus they speak a similar language, no sub-titles required.
sentences.chinese: 並且他們說的語言也和我們相似，連副標題都省了。

sentences.english: Header Designer exposes Heading and SubHeading properties to the user.
sentences.chinese: 頭設計公開標題與副標題屬性給用戶。

sentences.english: Use clear and unique subheads to provide promises of what's coming.
sentences.chinese: 使用清晰明確的副標題表明後面文章的內容。

sentences.english: A guy who watches American TV shows without subtitles just came by.
sentences.chinese: 翻譯人觀看美國電視節目，不用副標題拜訪。

sentences.english: The subtitles or subheadings within the post.
sentences.chinese: 文章中的副標題或子標題。

sentences.english: Use unique looking sub-headings and emphasis.
sentences.chinese: 使用獨特的副標題和強調符號。

sentences.english: Visitors who read beyond the headline, scan subheadings .
sentences.chinese: 不瀏覽標題的訪問者，會注意副標題。

sentences.english: Try to start most subheadings with the same part of speech, such as a verb or a noun.
sentences.chinese: 副標題開頭的短語應該儘量詞性相同。

sentences.english: The book's subtitle is "A Cautionary Tale of AIG's Corporate ­Suicide."
sentences.chinese: 書的副標題是“美國國際集團自毀警示錄”。

sentences.english: Make use of subheadings to bring order and coherence to your review.
sentences.chinese: 利用副標題來使你的綜述有序和連貫。
運用醒目的標題與副標題。

sentences.english: They jobs are listed in alphabetical order under the subheadings .
sentences.chinese: 工作需求是按副標題的字母順序排列的。

definition: variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]
